Package com.github.anastaciocintra.escpos

Class Style

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.anastaciocintra.escpos.Style
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EscPosConst
    public class Style
extends Object
implements EscPosConst
    Supply ESC/POS text style commands Note: If your printer isn't compatible with this class, you can try to use PrintModeStyle class
    See Also:
    PrintModeStyle

      • getConfigBytes

        public byte[] getConfigBytes()
                      throws IOException
        Configure font Style.

        Select character font.

        ASCII ESC M n

        Turn emphasized(bold) mode on/off.

        ASCII ESC E n

        set font size.

        ASCII GS ! n

        select underline mode

        ASCII ESC – n

        Select justification

        ASCII ESC a n

        Select default line spacing

        ASCII ESC 2

        Set line spacing

        ASCII ESC 3 n

        Turn white/black reverse print mode on/off

        ASCII GS B n

        Returns:
        ESC/POS commands to configure style
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
